message.description: A message in a thread of conversations attached to a feed item

id.description: A unique identifier for each message on the thread

sequenceNumber.description: A higher sequence number means that it came later; no other meaning should be imputed

replyTo.description: The unique ID of any message that this one is replying to - a thread

postedByUID.description: The UID of the user that posted this message

postedByName.description: The name of the user that posted this message

text.description: Rich text that can include any unicode e.g emoji

timestamp.description: When this message was created. RFC3339.
timestamp.$comment: The feed viewer should use this to calculate a HUMANIZED age
